name: Devilled Eggs
description: Letâ€™s get cracking on an egg-cellent adventure! These little pockets of pure deliciousness are the life of any party, the MVPs of potlucks, and the champions of finger food. With creamy centres, vibrant dill, and a hint of chipotle, these protein-packed appies will be a hit at your next gathering. Here's a tip: use the Muffin Maker for easy serving!

ingredients.name: Lemon Dilly Dip Mix or Creamy Potato Salad Dressing Mix
Chipotle Aioli Mix or Buffalo Seasoning

preparation:
1. Halve eggs lengthwise and carefully remove yolks. 
  2. In a bowl, mash yolks with a fork. Blend in mayonnaise, dip mix, aioli mix, and salt until well combined. 
  3. Spoon yolk mixture into egg white halves.
